record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 2828
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 2828 -- (Senate - October 03, 2007)

[Page: S12693]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 2828 has been received from the House and is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 2828) to provide compensation to relatives of United States citizens who were killed as a result of the bombings of United States Embassies in East Africa on August 7, 1998.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for its second reading and then object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
